Hello, I'M JOHAN

I'M AN AMBITIOUS

About Me

I'm a french web developer based in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg.

My optimism and curiosity are always leading me to discover and learn, to gain new experience in my whole life.

I like to exchange my knowledge to progress in the same way, but also to think and imagine new things.

I know how to work seriously, but always with smile and a lot of enthusiasm to spend a good day together at work, and after.

I also like sports, music, visiting new places, cooking or spend my Saturday evening doing monitor technology. (Okay with just one beer, I swear)
